message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to get a better deal.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $10,250. How about we try $9,750? I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to save a bit more.
